name: Deeper or deeper
description:
My entry for the ludum dare 48 on the theme deeper and deeper.

The goal of the game is to score as much points as possible in one minute. You are presented with the correct Deeper world at the top, just click on the same on in the below list.

The idea came from my dyslexia when I reed the theme as deeper and diper, which made no sense of course.

I wanted to add mouth-made sounds but I didn't had the time. Maybe in later release :)

This was made in less than 24 hours.
